responses.title: Tremble, vermin, before the stony gaze of the Gorgon.
Their deaths will be swift and cold as stone.
Gaze upon Medusa's beauty, and despair!
First blood, and it came so easily.
First blood -- I like to start with dessert.
Let my beauty still your breath.
Come, my pets, your feast awaits.
I am the last thing you'll see.
Watch your cousin fly, my pets!
Look at me when I kill you.
Turn the mirror to the wall.
Stronger with every skin I shed.
It won't be long now, sisters.
Ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Ah, the wind in my serpents!
That'll teach you to try outstaring a snake.
So puny, I hardly had to unhinge my jaw.
My beauty fills your dying eyes.
There is no heart colder than mine.
Don't resist the cobra, little bird.
I'm surprised you lasted this long.
You'll make a fine addition to my rock garden.
I'm having a good hair day.
Hmm hmm hmm ha ha ha!
Never run your finger through my hair.
I thought my gaze might turn you to flesh.
Even stone is not immune to my fangs.
Meet a real snake, you eel.
You're still wet behind the ears.
Wriggle back to the water, little fish.
The Slithereen Guard fails at last.
Sink like a stone into the depths.
Leave the snake magic to the experts, Shaman.
I know a thing or two about working stone.
Oh, I mistook you for a fire hydra.
Ice cracks, the same as stone.
Shame I can't look you in the eye.
What a failure of a god.
Tell your brothers I said hello.
Oh, Phoenix, I should have known you'd go out with a bang.
Didn't you know snakes are cold-blooded?
Stone already, Tiny? I like that.
Stone-cold heart. My kind of man.
Let's drain these fools of mana.
Visage, shall my pets play with yours?
Stone already. My work is done.
Ah, Venomancer. We both traded beauty for power.
We well know, Venomancer — beauty fades, but power lasts forever.
I should have known you'd be here, Zeus.
Where is the justice in this?
Even a severed head can bite.
Gorgons, I won't fail you again!
I'm having a bad hair day.
The Gorgon's gaze will petrify them all!
I traded useless beauty for the power to wreak my vengeance.
Do I mourn for my lost loveliness? No.
I am never alone. My pets hiss around my head, comfort and reminder of my cold and vengeful road.
Gorgons, sisters, forgive my infirmity. I grow stronger day by day, and I will come for you.
When I was beautiful, I never knew what I was missing.
Never come between a Gorgon and her sisters. I will turn your blood and bone to stone, and shatter you into a thousand remorseful shards.
The only real beauty is power.
Is it creepy that I have a snakeskin purse?
Whatever will I do with you?
Ha ha ha hsss sss sss!
Look, my pets — a new trinket.
You can't vanquish what you can't see.

name: Attempting to Use an Ability on Cooldown
Attempting to Use an Ability without Mana

responses.title: Now, where did I put my snakeskin bag? Because this one, my friends, is in it!
I bring shame upon the Gorgons.
All for nothing. Gorgons, I have failed you.
Find me a mirror, and I'll end it all.
Hide my face, my pretty pets.
Load up all the vanquished for my rock garden.
That's what triumph tastes like, my pretty pets.
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Hmm hmm hmm ha ha ha ha ha!
Hmm hmm hmm hmm hmm hmm!
Hmm hmm hmm hmm hmm hmm!
Ha ha ha ha ha ssssss!
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
